DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: This is a demonstration of an Old School RPG dialogue system!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Do you understand?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Great!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: That's unfortunate.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Thanks for using Dialoguer. Good bye!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: You can use this dialogue template in any project, or use it to learn the Dialoguer system!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Welcome to the Dialoguer test scene!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: This is a demonstration of a Next-Gen RPG dialogue system!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Fancy, isn't it?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Why thank you!
How rude!
Thanks for using Dialoguer. Good bye!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: How many fingers does an average human have on a single hand?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: What? No!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: That's right!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Moving on, this is a template for Dialoguer. You're able to use it in any game you want.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo
